title: Test
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, with a total of 10 data points.
Overall Average ticket price in U.S. dollars has increased over the Year
Average ticket price in U.S. dollars is gradually constant from 2006/07 to 2015/16.
The steepest stays the same occurs in between the Year 2010/11 and 2011/12.
Max Average ticket price in U.S. dollars about 78.3 was recorded at Year 2013/14, and 2014/15
Min Average ticket price in U.S. dollars about 56.55 was recorded at Year 2006/07
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, with a total of 10 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2009/10 to 2013/14.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is moderately constant which exists from 2006/07 to 2009/10.
Conversely, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2014/15 to 2015/16.
Conversely, the next significant trend is slightly constant which exists from 2013/14 to 2014/15.
